answers.answer: Well I haven't went yet...I'm 36 weeks dialted too 2..been loosing my mucus plug over the last 2 days..& had ultrasound yesterday & baby girl is already 6 pounds 12 ounces & 19 inches long...!! I feel restless & have every sign of labor coming soon..this is my 4th pregnancy & 4th baby...& I will be getting an epidural for sure I have had one with every birth & wouldn't dare go without one.....iv meds wear off way to quick & I'm pretty sure when your dialted to 8 or 9 they don't let u have anything so the baby will come out alert..?? But each momma to there own..since my baby is big right now the doc told me yesterday to start walking more & having more sex to induce labor...because I'm measuring past 36 weeks
22 days left here and soft but not dilated :(
21 days left and counting down! Hopefully Thurs. I'm dilated more, been having a lot of contractions since cerclage was removed at 36 weeks.
4 days to go, no indication of baby coming anytime soon.
My due date was the 25th of August my little girl came July 23rd!!! At 11:59pm :) getting discharged from the nicu tomorrow couldn't be happier, such a little fighter I was blessed with :)
I'm due today and only 1cm dilated with 3rd child...have to go do a bio physical friday
I have a week to go.. No signs that she's coming yet!
I'm due on the 25th but hopefully I get some good news tomorrow

Due the 12th and so far just BH and alot of pressureDoc says no going past 40weeks due to Gestational Diabetes and PolyHydro... Soo, looks like induction if Lil Handsome doesn't break out on his own. I plan for an Epidural and any other pain management I can receive ;D
Due the 31st, 36 weeks +2. I am dilated to 2 cm and have been having contractions on and off. So ready for her to be here!!
I am getting induced tomorrow morning

question: How many August mamas already had there baby / or earlier than expected? And how was it  just curious I'm getting induced on the 12th..  I really thinking on getting iv meds instead of epidural
title: Due August
